title: Benjamin Ollada Memorial Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for freshmen or sophomore students enrolled in the Ann and H. J. Smead Department of Aerospace Engineering Sciences at the University of Colorado Boulder, with priority given to incoming freshmen students.
marketingContent: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for freshmen or sophomore students enrolled in the Ann and H. J. Smead Department of Aerospace Engineering Sciences at the University of Colorado Boulder, with priority given to incoming freshmen students.
